article_title: GCSO: Car stolen from Greenville County car dealership
article_text:
Greenville County Sheriff's Office investigators are asking for the public's help identifying a man they want to talk to about a car stolen from a dealership.

Investigators from the Greenville County Sheriff’s Office Auto Theft Unit believe this that man might have information about the theft of a gray 2015 Audi A5 on April 3 from Steve White Volkswagen/Audi on Duvall Drive in Greenville.



Investigators ask anyone with information regarding this case or the identity of the suspect to contact Crime Stoppers at 23-CRIME.

article_metadata.author: Stephanie Towers
